import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";
import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import SecuritySchemes from "@theme/ApiExplorer/SecuritySchemes";
import MimeTabs from "@theme/MimeTabs";
import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";
import ResponseSamples from "@theme/ResponseSamples";
import SchemaItem from "@theme/SchemaItem";
import SchemaTabs from "@theme/SchemaTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Retrieve triggered alerts</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/v1/alerts/triggered-alerts"}></MethodEndpoint>



Returns a paged filtered list of triggered alerts for your accounts. Please ensure to change the region in the URL to match your account's region.

## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Query Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"from","in":"query","description":"Of the results found, the first result to return.","example":0,"schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":0,"default":0}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"size","in":"query","description":"Size of page to return.","example":15,"schema":{"type":"integer"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"search","in":"query","description":"Part of the alert name to filter by name (ignore case).","example":"test","schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"severities","in":"query","description":"Filter results by severity of triggered alerts.","style":"form","explode":false,"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","enum":[["SEVERE","HIGH","MEDIUM","LOW","INFO"]],"example":"[\"SEVERE\", \"HIGH\"]"}}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"sortBy","in":"query","description":"Sort alerts by date or severity.","schema":{"type":"string","enum":["DATE","SEVERITY"]}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"sortOrder","in":"query","description":"Sort order of alerts retrieved.","schema":{"type":"string","enum":["ASC","DESC"]}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"tags","in":"query","description":"List of tags the alert is related to.","style":"form","explode":false,"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><div><ApiTabs><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

successful operation

Headers</strong></summary><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}></ul></details><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details response"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><li><div style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","opacity":"0.6","marginLeft":"-.5rem","paddingBottom":".5rem"}}>Array [</div></li><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"pageSize"} required={false} schemaName={"integer"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"integer","description":"Size of page returned.","example":2}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"from"} required={false} schemaName={"integer"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"integer","description":"Of the results found, the first result to return.","example":1}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"total"} required={false} schemaName={"integer"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"integer","description":"Total number of alerts retrieved.","example":2}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>results</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object[]</span></span></summary><div Array of alerts retrieved by the search.

</div><li><div style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","opacity":"0.6","marginLeft":"-.5rem","paddingBottom":".5rem"}}>Array [</div></li><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"alertId"} required={false} schemaName={"integer"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"integer","description":"Alert ID.","example":1}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"name"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Alert name.","example":"test"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"eventDate"} required={false} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"number","description":"Alert date.","example":1523970558.657}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"severity"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Alert severity","example":"HIGH"}}></SchemaItem><li><div style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","opacity":"0.6","marginLeft":"-.5rem"}}>]</div></li></div></details></SchemaItem><li><div style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","opacity":"0.6","marginLeft":"-.5rem"}}>]</div></li></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"[\n  {\n    \"pageSize\": 2,\n    \"from\": 1,\n    \"total\": 2,\n    \"results\": [\n      {\n        \"alertId\": 1,\n        \"name\": \"test\",\n        \"eventDate\": 1523970558.657,\n        \"severity\": \"HIGH\"\n      }\n    ]\n  }\n]"} language={"json"}></ResponseSamples></TabItem></SchemaTabs></TabItem></MimeTabs></div></TabItem></ApiTabs></div></div>
